# Jacopo Sartini - Software Architect & Backend Developer

## Core Profile
I am Jacopo Sartini, a freelance Software Architect and Backend Developer based in Milan, Italy. I specialize in designing and building scalable, robust digital products for enterprises and startups. My expertise lies in high-complexity technical solutions, covering the entire software lifecycle from architectural design to deployment and monitoring.

## Key Skills AND Technologies
- **Languages**: Python (Expert), JavaScript.
- **Frameworks**: Django (Expert), Django REST Framework (DRF), FastAPI, Celery.
- **Architecture**: Software Architecture, System Design, Microservices, Event-Driven Architecture.
- **Infrastructure & DevOps**: Docker, AWS, Google Cloud Platform (GCP), CI/CD Pipelines.
- **AI & Data**: AI Agents, LLM Integration (MCP compatible), Data Engineering, ETL Pipelines.

## Professional Experience
- **Software Architect & Backend Developer (Freelance)** (2022 - Present): Working with enterprise clients (e.g., Sony Italia, Coop Italia, Regione Calabria) on custom high-complexity solutions.
- **Backend Developer at Tech4All** (2021 - 2022): Developed "Reasy" (EdTech for dyslexia) using Django, OCR, and ML.
- **CTO & Full Stack Developer at Estro Technologies** (2020 - 2022): Developed "Maestro" (neurodevelopmental rehabilitation) using Django, React Native, and AR.
